name: Edgar Reich
description:
Edgar Reich ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Edgar Reich in mp3 format. The former business man is Reverend Edgar Reich. He has been called by the Lord to teach and preach in Revival. He is a devoted Christian teacher, leading adult Bible study groups at his Church, his former business and his community. God has called him into fulltime Christian Ministry to preach and teach in Revival. 

He became a Reverend under the leadership of Rev. Dr. R. L. Curry in July 2008.  The Lord has had brother Edgar start Revival Canada USA which is a ministry believing God for revival in North America. "God has promised to bring a Nation wide Revival to the United States of America and Canada prior to the return of the Lord Jesus Christ. Fires of Revival will break out all over the United States and Canada in many cities and spread from African American Churches to White Churches."

sermons.title: 81 days in the USA: The Current State of America
sermons.description: Only 6-9% of American Christians are now believing that the Bible is infallible and that Jesus Christ is the only way. The Church has sinned, we have sinned, not living and "doing" the word of God.  American true Christians are officially classified with extremists in the class of terrorists by the FBI and Homeland Security in the USA. True Christians love their enemies and do good yet we are starting to be hated. Jesus said this would happen. America and Canada are killing the unborn on an altar of lust. It is the greatest genocide in human history.

sermons.title: A Beautiful Mind
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares on the great need to have a mind like the Lord Jesus Christ's. He shares from personal experiences and from scripture how we should think and behave as a redeemed Christian. This is a powerful message that will lead you more into the conformity of Jesus Christ.

sermons.title: Denying God's Power For Revival - Part 1
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares a strong word on the wicked ways in Christians life's. He specifically shares about ways we deny God's power for revival in our daily walks. In this part he speaks of the lack of witnessing for Christ that we as believers in the West are not sharing our faith freely and boldly as we should. May God show us the evil in this and it to be repented of and to walk in the freedom of the Holy Spirit to be a living witness, a salt of the earth and light to this lost generation.

sermons.title: Denying God's Power For Revival And Victory
sermons.description: Brother Edgar delivers a powerful message giving a personal testimony of his victory over sin. He shows how Christians can practice besetting sins and can not walk in true victory over them. He then gives powerful testimonies of sins in the past who realized Jesus Christ as their victory over sins in practical reality in their lives.

sermons.title: God's Breaking Heart Over The North American Church
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares a prophetic word from the Lord of God's burden and breaking weeping heart for the sins of the Church in North America. He shares how God is grieving because of the hurt of the sins and the Church needs to repent and acknowledge this.

sermons.title: Lord Let Your Fire Fall!
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares a convicting message from the exhortation of brother Paul the Apostle to be a living sacrifice. He shares the old Testament type of what a sacrifice is and how the Lord is calling us in the New Covenant to be a sacrifice for our Lord. He shares many sins and reasons why we do not allow ourselves to be a sacrifice. Brother Edgar can be contacted at: edgarreich@revivalusacanada.org

sermons.title: Persecution And The Underground House Churches In Iran
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares about the history of the persecuted church in Iran. He gives some wonderful glimpses into the fast expanding house church movement in this country. Lastly this message leaves us with a deep sobriety to join with suffering with these brothers and sisters by being more obedient to the great commission call in our lives.

sermons.title: Persecution and the Underground Church in China
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares very powerful accounts of suffering of true disciples of Jesus in the underground Church in China. In comparison in the West we fall so short of the same authentic reality of these simple believers. This message is a informational message but also a call by the Holy Spirit to us in other countries to follow Jesus Christ whole-heartily in revival.

sermons.title: Self-Righteous Prayers (prayer call testimony)

sermons.title: The Antichrist Revealed: Preparing The Body Of Christ For The Coming World Leader by Edgar Reich
sermons.description: Brother edgar shares on the importance for Christians in North America and world-wide to realize the times we are in. There is an emerging one-world leader who will be the Anti-Christ. This is clearly taught us in Revelation 13 in Scriptures. Are you ready for this time? Is the Church prepared? Do listen to this important message.

sermons.title: The Great Suffering Of North Korean Christians
sermons.description: Brother Edgar shares a sobering word on the plight and sufferings of precious brothers and sisters in the Lord in North Korea. He shares many testimonies and stories of these believers as well as religious system of Juche over the people which worships the leader of the country as a god.
